dmca.title: GemStonegifts complains of copying
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,
In regard to violation of copyrighted material, Mr [private] of www.thewellsclinic.com andn www.spiritual-healing.com.uk has copid the below pages to my site:

You can see that they have been copied word for word here:
My page will be first, his is last. Please note they are identical. In spite of repeated requests he has refused to remove my copyrighted content from his website and continues to pass them off as his own work. It might be easier to send these to you in an email if you can provide me with an email address.

mine: http://www.gemstonegifts.com/resources/healing.htm
his copy http://www.spiritual-healing.co.uk/library/r07healing/crystal/a2zgems.htm

mine: http://www.gemstonegifts.com/Colors/colorsindex.htm
his copy http://www.spiritual-healing.co.uk/library/r07healing/crystal/colour.htm 

mine: http://www.gemstonegifts.com/Colors/brown.htm
his copy http://www.spiritual-healing.co.uk/library/r07healing/crystal/cbrown.htm


mine: http://www.gemstonegifts.com/Colors/green.htm
his copy http://www.spiritual-healing.co.uk/library/rD7healing/crystal/cgreen.htm

mine: http://www.sobrietystones.com/resources/Colors/meaning_ color_ yellow_3.htm
his copy http://www.spiritual-healing.co.uk/library/r07healing/crystal/cyellow.htm
